auth.loginRequired: Log in to send a question.
auth.welcomeDescription: Log in to send and receive anonymous questions.

passkey.setupError: Try again. We couldn't set up your passkey.
passkey.setupCompleteDescription: You can now log in faster and more securely.
passkey.nudgeTitle: Worried someone might answer for you?
passkey.nudgeDescription: Use Face ID or Touch ID for a faster, safer login.
passkey.fasterDescription:
Log in with one touch using Face ID,
fingerprint, or device lock.

share.title: Share
share.easyShareDescription: Share your link anywhere. Get questions with one tap.
share.instagramShareDescription: Save your answers as images and share them to Instagram Stories or feeds.

questions.inputPlaceholder: What do you want to ask?
questions.whoToAsk: How do you want to ask?
questions.termsAgreement: Sending a question means you agree to our <link>terms of service</link>.

answers.deleteResponseDescription: We'll remove your answer, and the question will go back to your inbox.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.emptyDescription: New questions will show up here.
inbox.declineDescription: This will remove it from your inbox. You won't be able to answer it later.

settings.title: Settings
settings.profileRequiredDescription: Complete your account setup to continue.
settings.anonymousRestrictionDescription: Limit anonymous questions to reduce unwanted messages.
settings.profileSettingsDescription: Set up your profile and social links.
settings.accountSettingsDescription: Manage your username, phone, and security.

notificationSettings.title: Notifications
notificationSettings.enableDescription: Get notified when you receive new questions.
notificationSettings.unsupported: Try another browser. Push notifications aren't supported here.
notificationSettings.blocked: Enable notifications in your browser settings. They're blocked right now.
notificationSettings.permissionBlocked: Enable notifications in your browser settings. They're blocked.
notificationSettings.configError: Try again later. We couldn't set up notifications.
notificationSettings.subscribeError: Try again. We couldn't enable notifications.
notificationSettings.unsubscribeError: Try again. We couldn't disable notifications.
notificationSettings.testError: Try again. We couldn't send the test notification.

home.heroDescription:
Ask anonymously, answer honestly.
Share your profile and hear what your friends really think.
home.safeAnonymityDescription: Questioner identities stay completely anonymous. Start honest conversations without any pressure.

questionSecurity.anyoneDescription: Even non-members can send anonymous questions.
questionSecurity.verifiedLabel: Only verified users can ask anonymously
questionSecurity.verifiedDescription: Only users with verified phone numbers can send anonymous questions.

restrictions.anonymousLoginRequired: Don't worry—you can still ask anonymously.
restrictions.identifiedOnly: This user only accepts identified questions.
restrictions.loginForIdentified: Log in to ask with your name.

errors.userNotFound: Check the link. We couldn't find this user.
errors.profileLoadError: Try again. We couldn't load your profile.
errors.profileUpdateError: Try again. We couldn't update your profile.
errors.recipientAndContentRequired: Add a recipient and a question.
errors.publicQuestionLoginRequired: Log in to send public questions.
errors.publicQuestionOnly: This user only accepts public questions.
errors.anonymousLoginRequired: Log in to send anonymous questions.
errors.questionCreateFailed: Try again. We couldn't send your question.
errors.questionCreateError: Try again. We hit a snag sending your question.
errors.questionIdAndContentRequired: Add a question ID and your answer.
errors.onlyRecipientCanAnswer: Only the recipient can answer this question.
errors.onlyRecipientCanDeleteQuestion: Only the recipient can delete this question.
errors.onlyRecipientCanDeleteAnswer: Only the recipient can delete this answer.
errors.questionDeleteError: Try again. We couldn't delete the question.
errors.answerCreateFailed: Try again. We couldn't save your answer.
errors.answerDeleteError: Try again. We couldn't delete your answer.
errors.answerCreateError: Try again. We hit a snag saving your answer.

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: See what your friends are asking and answering
friends.emptyDescription: When your friends answer questions, they'll show up here.

a2hs.title: Add to Home Screen
a2hs.description:
Access instantly like an app
and get notifications.
